[C] All your other "Baji, Race to the Shrine" gain the following ability. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."
[A] BOND/"Baji, Race to the Shrine" [(1)]

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] [Return 2 Character cards from your Waiting Room to your Library, shuffle your Library] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Revenge:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if there is a Climax card in your Climax Zone, you may put the top card of your Library in your Stock.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times Soul of that Character.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Revenge:: Characters, and that Character gains +4500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Revenge:: Characters.

[Counter] You may discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room. If so, choose a Character in battle, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[C] This cannot deal Damage to players." X = Soul of that Character. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] When a Climax is placed to your Climax Zone, you may look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, and place them back on top of your Library in any order.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Revenge:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] RESONANCE [(1) Reveal a "Mikey, I'll Take Care of This" from your hand] At the start of the Encore Step, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.
[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.
--None--

[C] For each of your other ::Revenge:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Revenge:: Characters, you may choose a ::Revenge:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.
[C] For each of your other Back Row ::Revenge:: Characters, this gains +2500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Revenge:: Characters.
[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, put the top 7 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = # of Climax cards among them. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] [Discard a ::Revenge:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage you may pay cost. If so, return the top card of your Clock to your hand.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "You Guys Too Follow Me" is in your Climax Zone, put the bottom 4 cards of your Opponent's Library in their Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = # of Climax cards among those cards. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Revenge:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO RESONANCE [Reveal a "Takemichi, Thank You for Bravery" in your hand] When "First Kiss" is placed in your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row and you have another ::Revenge:: Character, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 2 cards that are either ::Revenge:: Characters and/or "Clover-shaped Necklace", reveal them, put them in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Revenge:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] [Put another ::Revenge:: Character from your Stage to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in your Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or placed by the effect of the CX COMBO of "Takemichi, Thank You for Bravery" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room, Send this to Memory] At the end of this card's attack, if "Time Leap" is in the Climax Zone, if you have another "Naoto, Trigger", you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room with "Takemichi" in name and put it in the Slot this was in.

[A] When your Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When this attacks, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library, choose 1 of them and put it on top of the Library, and put the rest in the Waiting Room."
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room."

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all players perform the following action. "If there are 5 or more cards in your Memory, choose 4 cards in your Memory, and put all cards in your Memory other than those chosen this way in the Waiting Room."
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Revenge:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your ::Revenge:: Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1) Discard a ::Revenge:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, this doesn't Reverse for the turn."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, put them on top of your Library in any order, and choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return that Character to their hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a ::Revenge:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it face-down under this as Marker.
[A] [Put all Markers from under this on the bottom of your Library in any order] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent X times. X = # of Markers put on the bottom of the Library in order to pay for the cost of this ability. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character gains the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] This cannot move to another Slot."
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or higher, you may put this in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all of your Opponent's Front Row Characters get -500 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Revenge:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] During your turn, all your other Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] If there's no Markers under this, choose from your Waiting Room either a ::Revenge:: Character or a "Clover-shaped Necklace" and put it face-up under this as Marker.
[S] [(1) Rest this] Return a Marker from under this to your hand.

[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your ::Revenge:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When "It'd Be Nice If It Goes Well" is placed in your Climax Zone, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a ::Revenge:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this attacks, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."

[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 0 or lower Character and put it in any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, if there are 2 or fewer cards in your Memory, you may Send this to Memory.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] All your other ::Revenge:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Rest this] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 1 or higher Characters, and your Opponent chooses a Level X or lower Character in their Waiting Room and Swap the chosen Characters. X = Level of the Character you chose this way -1.

[C] If "Takemichi, Thank You for Bravery" is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Revenge:: Characters, this gains +3000 Power.
[C] CX COMBO If "Mizo Middle Five" is in your Climax Zone, this is in the Front Row, and you have 2 or more other ::Revenge:: Characters, all your other "Takemichi, Thank You for Bravery", "Akkun, Thinks of Allies", "Takuya, Childhood Friend", "Makoto, Thinks With Lower Half", and "Yamagishi, Moodmaker" in all Zones gain the Choice Trigger Icon.
[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 3 or higher, all your other ::Revenge:: Characters gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a card in your Clock and return it to your hand. If so, put a card from your hand in your Clock.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, if there's a Character Opposite this, you may move this to an empty slot in your Front Row.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Revenge:: Characters among those cards.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::TRAIT:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Revenge:: Characters.

If so, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Opponent's Library and choose up to 3 Characters where the sum of the Power of the Characters chosen this way is X or lower, put the chosen cards in Clock in any order, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = Power of this card.
